alert.note: Alert for Curry County; De Baca County; Roosevelt County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued March 30 at 2:44PM MDT until March 31 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. For the High Wind Watch, west to northwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...Curry County, De Baca County, and Roosevelt County. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 8 PM MDT this evening. For the High Wind Watch, from Friday morning through Friday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Blowing dust may cause low visibility on area highways.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Curry County; De Baca County; Roosevelt County
